tool_description: Analyzes bird photographs to extract key visual identification features including coloration, patterns, body parts, and distinctive markings.

image_path.description: File path or URL to the bird photograph

image_quality.description: Image quality level: high, medium, low

error_messages: Invalid image path: Ensure the file exists and is accessible at the specified path.
Unsupported image format: Use common formats like JPG, PNG, or GIF.
Image quality too poor: Image resolution is insufficient for feature extraction.
No bird detected: Unable to identify bird subject in the provided image.
usage: Provide the image_path to a clear bird photograph. Optionally specify image_quality and focus_areas for targeted analysis. Returns extracted visual features for identification.

primary_colors.description: Dominant colors observed on the bird

distinctive_markings.description: Notable patterns, stripes, spots, or unique markings
